dmca.title: Piracy site hosted on your network
dmca.body:
-----Original Message-----
From: Oscar Simpson [mailto:oscar_j_simpson@yahoo.com] 
Sent: Monday, May 30, 2005 4:19 PM
To: abuse@theplanet.com
Cc: legal-response@theplanet.com
Subject: Piracy site hosted on your network

This is to inform you, again, that the website www.fucking-yahoo.com which
is hosted on your network is offering pirated software for download. In
particular Partition Magic 8.0, CuteFTP, Photoshop CS, and Microsoft Visual
Basic 6.0. The direct links for these downloads are as follows:

http://www.fucking-yahoo.com/programs/drugs/Visual%20Basic%206.zip
http://www.fucking-yahoo.com/programs/drugs/Partition%20Magic%208.0%20Pro.zi
p
http://www.fucking-yahoo.com/programs/drugs/CuteFTP%20Professional%207.zip
http://www.fucking-yahoo.com/programs/drugs/Photoshop%20CS%202.zip

Since you blatantly disregarded my previous email concerning this piracy I
have sent emails to the companies that own the intellectual property in
question as well. Perhaps in the future you will investigate such complaints
rather than ignore them.


__________________________________________________
Do You Yahoo!?
Tired of spam?  Yahoo! Mail has the best spam protection around
http://mail.yahoo.com
